value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Do you agree with Prince Hríd? Do
you think there's a traitor here,
$Nu?$k$pIt's a chilling thought...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I absolutely cannot believe it!$k$pWe're all allies here. All of us, even
Fjorm and the others. Not just allies
but friends! I trust my friends.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Sharena...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Unlikely as it may be, we have to
consider the possibility. Because if
there is a traitor...$k$pPrince Hríd is right. We will meet our
end here.$k$pWho could it be?$k$pNeither of the three of us...and
certainly not $Nu,
either.$k$pThe Order of Heroes runs a tight
ship. I can say with confidence that
we haven't been infiltrated.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I have no doubt!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Among our allies from Nifl... I can't
imagine that Fjorm is the traitor.$k$pThat leaves us with Princess Ylgr and
Prince Hríd.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|You needn't worry. Neither of them
would betray us.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Fjorm! My apologies. It's
not that we distrust Nifl...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|There is no need to apologize. I agree
with my brother—even if it is unlikely,
we must consider the possibility.$k$pHowever, what I came to tell you is
that my siblings and I can be trusted.$k$pWe swore an oath together.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|An oath? What sort of oath?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|We swore to Nifl, the dragon of ice...
It was a sacred oath made by all four
of us as Múspell invaded.$k$pIn doing so, we dedicated ourselves
to the fight against Múspell. *cough*$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Fjorm! Please, don't overtax
yourself.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|You may think that oath was just
pretty words... It was not.$k$pFor the royalty of Nifl, breaking that
oath is unthinkable—the worst sort of
disgrace.$k$pBelieve me when I say that we, the
children of Nifl, are truly your allies.
*COUGH*$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I believe you, Princess Fjorm. We all
do! Right, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...I have no doubt.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|And I cannot conceive of a traitor
coming from Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Indeed. That is what I cannot
understand... How is it even possible
that we were betrayed?$k$p

$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The Rite of Flames requires a certain
kind of...kindling...to fuel Surtr's
powers of resurrection.$k$pSurtr plans to feed two girls to the
flames that sustain his power...$k$pAnd Zacharias told me that one of
the girls is his sister.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|His sister? Princess Veronica!$k$pThat Surtr would go that far...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She may have vexed us at every turn,
but I can't help but pity her now.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Two girls? Who is the second?$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Anger|That, Zacharias did not know.
Perhaps one of Múspell's own royal
family or another kingdom's...$k$pNo matter who it may be, we must
make haste. If we do not rescue
them, their lives are forfeit.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|We must hurry!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The path leads us this way... From
now on, we won't be able to avoid
our foes. Prepare for a fight.$k$p
